description: ISMIP6 repeats selected DECK experiments with coupled AOGCM-ISM (where the ice sheet is an interactive component of the AOGCM) and standalone ISM (where the ice sheet model is driven offline by output from either an uncoupled AOGCM or from a standard ISMIP6 dataset).
keywords: ice sheets, Greenland, Antarctica, sea level
long_name: Ice Sheet Model Intercomparison Project for CMIP6
label: ISMIP6
rationale: Improving confidence in projections of the sea level rise associated with mass loss from the ice sheets of Greenland and Antarctica.
